channel.description: Recent content in Facebook on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)

item.title: My interviews with Facebook, Twitter, and Microsoft
item.author: julio@meroh.net (Julio Merino)
item.description: Now that you know about my recent departure from Google, it is time to look into how the whole interviewing process went with all of Facebook, Twitter, and Microsoft. Read on for details on engineering levels, the timeline of all three processes, and some key observations of each.
